subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Museums
Depression (Mental)
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Chris Antley, who died in 2000 and is being inducted into the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame on Friday, was known for his success on the track and his struggles off it.
snippet: Chris Antley, who died in 2000 and is being inducted into the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame on Friday, was known for his success on the track and his struggles off it.
